meanings.definition: A person who draws up plans or outlines.
meanings.sent1: The drafters created detailed blueprints for the new building.
meanings.sent2: The drafters at the architecture firm are very skilled at designing structures.
meanings.sent3: The drafters decided to draw a giant banana as the centerpiece of the building plans.
meanings.sent4: The drafters' pens danced across the paper, bringing the project to life.
meanings.sent5: The drafters meticulously sketched every detail of the floor plan.

meanings.definition: A person who writes the first version of a document.
meanings.sent1: The drafters of the constitution laid out the fundamental laws of the land.
meanings.sent2: The drafters of the proposal worked tirelessly to articulate their ideas clearly.
meanings.sent3: The drafters decided to write the document in invisible ink for a fun surprise.
meanings.sent4: The drafters' words flowed effortlessly as they penned the initial draft.
meanings.sent5: The drafters carefully crafted the opening paragraph to captivate the readers.

meanings.definition: A person who selects or recruits individuals for a sports team.
meanings.sent1: The drafters chose the best players for the soccer team.
meanings.sent2: The drafters scouted talented athletes to join the basketball team.
meanings.sent3: The drafters held a draft party to celebrate their player selections.
meanings.sent4: The drafters' keen eye for talent helped them build a winning team.
meanings.sent5: The drafters strategically picked players based on their skills and teamwork abilities.
